sub_title: Director Net Zero Carbon Strategy at The HEINEKEN Company | Climate Strategy | Global Sustainable Development | Transformation | Systemic Changes | Born at 346 ppm CO2
summary:
A passionate sustainability professional who look after federating organization to tackle the climate crisis.

Embrace constant learning on climate solutions, carbon tax, renewables, ESG and green finance.

Experienced in implementing process improvement and setting up teams to create successful conditions

High capability of adaptation in multicultural environment, cope with ambiguity and able to maintain consistent high performance year in year.
